about_the_game:
Heaven Crawler is a cozy, yet challenging roguelite hack-n-slash dungeon crawler with rpg elements.

Make your way through rooms full of robots and defeat them to gain exp, money and become stronger each run!

The tower, riddled with mystery and secrets has over 10 unique Zones, each with unique rooms, traps, challenges and enemies to defeat.

At the end of each zone a Colossal Boss awaits your mastery!

There is a Big Boss at the end of Each Zone, as well as other secret and mini Bossess to test your skills.

Mix-and-match Helmets, Mechanical Arms and Armors to build your own playstyle!

There are no classes in the game, instead each piece of gear unlocks diferent stats and abilities for you to choose and make your own!

Each defeat is an opportunity to learn and grow!

Everytime you die, you go back to lobby with some of your money, lose al exp, but gain Research on the equipment you used, improving it.

Be wary and use the Elements to your favor in order to master each Zone!

There are over 7 elements fully reactive with player, enemies and props like electricty, fire, ice and corrosion.

Physics-based combat and strategy!

Use physics to your favor and throw, punch, break and evade fully breakable props and enemies.

Chat with NPC's to learn about the tower and the world behind!

Interact with NPC robots that are also making their way through the tower, seek their help and learn from their mistakes.

Epic meets Cute in an isometric, vibes-filled, Heavenly Diorama!

Delight yourself with a new visual style in the genre, aiming to have a sense of the sublime, yet focusing on the little things,

This Demo Features:

  • 6 Elements
  • 1 Zones
  • 1 Boss
  • 4 NPC’s
  • 7 Enemies
  • 30+ Equipment
  • 10+ Rooms
  • 3 Beautiful Orchestral pieces

Collect Helmets, Armors, and Mechanical Arms, strengthen your character to ascend to Heaven and save your mother's soul!
